description.raw:
In pull request #18, I mentioned that the ros topic names didn't satisfy the API published in the DRC user guide because there weren't the proper xacro parameters available.

I didn't realize it, but the drcsim xacro is already passing "l_hand" and "r_hand" as the xacro parameter named parent (referring to the parent link name). So without modifying drcsim, this pull request will fix the ROS topic API.

I also modified the sandia_hand_both_on_box model so that it would still work with this change.
